title: [Y520-15IKBN_SIT]Battery life video playback is over SPEC during run Jump Start performance test
description:
Test condition:

OS: RS1 14393

Language: EN/CHS

BIOS/EC: V15/V15

Preload: V06 Test Result: 

Test units: 1#33, 2#05，4#32, 5#05, 6#03, 7#03, 8#03

Fail units: 2#05@EN, 8#03@EN

Fail rate of units: 2 out of 7 units Issue description: 

Battery life video playback is over SPEC during run Jump Start performance test.

Rule: OEM image test result should meet target goal, if test fail, run Base image again.

For each performance metrics above, assessed on same Windows SKU, OS Version and Language, the performance measured on the OEM Image must be less than 20% gap from that measured on the Baseline Image. Fail units is HDD configuration, this issue is different with ID#136222.

SKU2@EN delta is 25%,

SKU8@EN delta is 24%.

Refer to the attachment for detail test result.
